PKS soal Anies Diundang Kongres NasDem: Beliau Punya Hak Hubungan ke Siapapun
07 Nov 2019, 05:41 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan diundang di Kongres II Partai NasDem. Menyikapi hal tersebut, PKS tidak menganggap undangan NasDem ke Anies sebagai hal yang spesial.
"Mas Anies punya hak berhubungan dengan siapapun," kata Ketua DPP PKS Mardani Ali Sera kepada detikcom, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Mardani tidak melihat NasDem ingin melakukan penjajakan politik terhadap Anies. Dia juga mengatakan bajak-membajak tokoh politik bukan merupakan budaya yang sehat.
"Langkah bajak membajak bukan budaya yang sehat. Dan PKS tidak melihat NasDem membajak Pak Anies," ucapnya.
Sebelumnya, Sekjen NasDem Johnny G. Plate mengatakan undangan ke Anies selaku tuan rumah kongres yang diselenggarakan di Jakarta. Anies juga akan diberi kesempatan menyampaikan pidato.
"Sebagaimana misalnya Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Pak Anies Baswedan, yang adalah tuan rumah atau tempat dilaksanakan kongres dan pembina politik daerah, kami mengharapkan bisa hadir dan memberikan ucapan selamat datang kepada delegasi kongres yang berasal dari seluruh penjuru tanah air, " ujar Johnny di kantor DPP NasDem, Jalan RP Soeroso, Gondangdia, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Johnny mengatakan Anies akan menyampaikan pidato selamat datang kepada seluruh peserta kongres. Pidato itu disebut sebagai simbol persahabatan politik.
"Ini merupakan bagian dari keramahtamahan politik dan persahabatan politik yang kami bangun," lanjut Johnny.

PKS about Anies Invited by NasDem Congress: She Has Relationship Rights to Anyone
Nov 7 2019, 5:41 p.m. by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan was invited to the Second Congress of the NasDem Party. In response to this, PKS did not consider NasDem's invitation to Anies as special.
"Mas Anies has the right to deal with anyone," PKS DPP Chairman Mardani Ali Sera told AFP on Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Mardani did not see NasDem wanting to conduct a political assessment of Anies. He also said hijacking political figures was not a healthy culture.
"The plow is not a healthy culture. And the PKS does not see NasDem hijacking Pak Anies," he said.
Previously, NasDem Secretary General Johnny G. Plate said the invitation to Anies as the host of the congress held in Jakarta. Anies will also be given the opportunity to deliver a speech.
"As for example the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Pak Anies Baswedan, who is the host or venue for the congress and regional political adviser, we hope to be able to attend and give congratulations to congressional delegates from all parts of the country," Johnny said at the DPP office NasDem, Jalan RP Soeroso, Gondangdia, Central Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Johnny said Anies would deliver a welcome speech to all congress participants. The speech was called a symbol of political friendship.
"This is part of the political hospitality and political friendship that we have built," Johnny continued.
